trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Ithaca
There were no other sightings in Ithaca on or around March 16th 2012
Summary: Black, helicopter shaped, with strange appendages, no noise, drone?
divs: sighting detailsi was putting gas in my car at tops gas station on meadow st. ithaca around 5pm on 3\16\12. sky was totally clear, blue, sunny. i looked up towards south\west and noticed a tiny black odd shape, hovering, sometimes spinning. seemed to have an appendage at times. it moved slowly west to east. i watched for about 3 minutes. no noise from it. it was not a helicopter. i stopped at another store in that area and came out about 15 minutes later. two low flying jets were then flying in that area. i did not see the object at that time.
